from dataclasses import dataclass, field
from typing import Any, List, Dict

@dataclass
class _BRACES:
    name: str = "BRACES"
    definitions: Any = None  # Replace None with `brace` if brace is defined at module level.
    parents: List[Any] = field(default_factory=list)
    childen: List[Any] = field(default_factory=list)  # Note: 'childen' seems like a typo; consider 'children'
    properties: List[Any] = field(default_factory=list)
    jsondata: Dict[Any, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
    basic: List[str] = field(default_factory=lambda: ['brace'])
